mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item (pid, uid, oid, number, has_review) VALUES (#{product.id}, #{user.id}, #{order.id}, #{number}, #{hasReview})
mapper.sql: SELECT oi.id AS 'oi_id', oi.oid AS 'oi_oid', oi.number AS 'oi_number', oi.has_review AS 'oi_hasReview', u.id AS 'u_id', u.name AS 'u_name', p.id AS 'p_id', p.name AS 'p_name', p.subtitle AS 'p_subTitle', p.original_price AS 'p_originalPrice', p.promote_price AS 'p_promotePrice', p.create_date AS 'p_createDate', p.stock AS 'p_stock', o.id AS 'o_id', o.order_code AS 'o_orderCode', o.address AS 'o_address', o.post AS 'o_post', o.receiver AS 'o_receiver', o.mobile AS 'o_mobile', o.user_message AS 'o_userMessage', o.create_date AS 'o_createDate', o.pay_date AS 'o_payDate', o.delivery_date AS 'o_deliveryDate', o.confirm_date AS 'o_confirmDate', o.status AS 'o_orderStatus' FROM order_item AS oi LEFT OUTER JOIN user AS u ON oi.uid = u.id LEFT OUTER JOIN product AS p ON oi.pid = p.id LEFT OUTER JOIN order_ AS o ON oi.oid = o.id
mapper.select: WHERE oi.oid = -1 AND u.id = #{uid} AND p.id = #{pid}

SELECT oi.id AS 'oi_id', oi.number AS 'oi_number', p.id AS 'p_id', p.promote_price AS 'p_promotePrice' FROM order_item AS oi LEFT OUTER JOIN product AS p ON oi.pid = p.id WHERE oi.oid = #{oid} ORDER BY oi.id
